A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Seriously disappointed. Although the acting was mostly good\, so many other parts were well below expectations. I felt the storyline was sacrificed in order to shoehorn in useless characters\,  simply there to ensure the movie is as PC as possible. I realise they tried to make something different. However\, this was the wrong type of different. The greats of the past especially Luke (Mark Hamil) deserved a richer more true to the character storyline.
